title: Advanced champion stats menu
body:
Is there a way to keep the Advanced player stats menu open permanently without having to toggle it? You can keep the regular champion stats menu up permanently or you can turn it off so why can't we do the same for the advanced menu?

Here is an image of what I'm talking about, some people might not even know this menu existed.

http://imgur.com/a/PTet0

replies.body: I don't believe there's currently a way to have the advanced stats showing at all times; though, you can toggle the basic stats.  For now, holding the C key would be your best bet.  It's a good idea though, if you'd like to let your voice be heard by the community and devs over at the [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  Best of luck!
